newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Dates set for preliminary coalition talks - NZ First.
newsitem.headline: Dates set for preliminary coalition talks - NZ First.

text.p: New Zealand First leader Winston Peters said on Thursday his party had reached an agreement with the National and Labour parties on when to begin preliminary coalition talks.
The NZ First negotiating team will meet its National party counterpart at 2 p.m. on October 21, and talks with Labour's negotiating team will get underway at 10 a.m. on October 23.
Peters said the preliminary talks would concentrate on procedural matters such as confidentiality and negotiation processes.
